gemini_config.system_instruction: Design enterprise-level sponsorship tiers ($500, $1000, $5000) with benefits like priority support, custom features, and brand visibility for my [project].

usage_example.python:
import google.generativeai as genai

genai.configure(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    model_name="gemini-2.0-flash",
    system_instruction="""Design enterprise-level sponsorship tiers ($500, $1000, $5000) with benefits like priority support, ..."""
)

response = model.generate_content("Your message here")
print(response.text)
